entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard. He is mentioned as someone who would have known if he was in on the plan.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a young wizard. He is trying to explain how Voldemort caught up with him.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A character who is questioning Harry about his encounter with Voldemort.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a friend of Harry's. He is mentioned as someone who was with Harry when they were being chased by Death Eaters.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: The mother of the sanctuary where Harry and Hagrid took refuge.

entities.name: stan shunpike
entities.description: A conductor on the Knight Bus who is mentioned as someone that Harry saw during his journey.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who are followers of Voldemort. They are mentioned as being the ones who were chasing Harry and Hagrid.

relationships.description: Voldemort caught up with Harry during his journey, but only towards the end. He didn't know which one Harry was in the beginning.
The Death Eaters were chasing Harry and Hagrid during their journey, but they seemed to recognize Harry as the true Harry and abandoned the chase.
Voldemort was summoned by the Death Eaters after they recognized Harry.
